articles.author: John Bonifield, CNN Health
articles.title: Only half of Covid-19 vaccines delivered to states have been used, CDC data shows. Here's one reason why
articles.description: A possible explanation is emerging for why federal data shows only about half of the vaccine supply delivered in the US has been administered.

articles.title: Former Russia oil tycoon: I was one of the lucky ones
articles.description: CNN's Matthew Chance speaks exclusively with Mikhail Khodorkovsky, once Russia's richest man, who -- after falling out with Russian President Vladimir Putin himself -- spent more than 10 years in a Russian jail. He says the US should impose tough sanctions on…

articles.author: Omar Jimenez and Jack Hannah, CNN
articles.title: Teacher unions flex their power in Covid school reopening chaos
articles.description: Some teachers opposed to being ordered back to class in the pandemic have the power of the union behind them. And that is adding an extra layer of complexity as parents, districts, children and teachers themselves try to work out how to reopen schools.

articles.author: By Tom Page, CNN
articles.title: Could a 258mph electric hypercar help Dubai ditch its gas guzzlers?
articles.description: Rimac Automobili and startup EV Lab are hoping speed and luxury will help Dubai embrace electric cars.
articles.content: (CNN) According to its designers, the 1,914-horsepower Rimac C_Two hypercar will take a driver from 0 to 60 miles per hour in under two seconds, putting it among the quickest cars in the world. Its 2… [+4706 chars]

articles.author: Konstantin Toropin and Steve Almasy, CNN
articles.title: Offensive lineman Chad Wheeler arrested on suspicion of felony domestic violence, waived by Seattle Seahawks
articles.description: Now-former Seahawks player Chad Wheeler was arrested Friday on suspicion of felony domestic violence after an incident at a residence in a Seattle suburb, police and court records say.
articles.content:
(CNN)Now-former Seahawks player Chad Wheeler was arrested Friday on suspicion of felony domestic violence after an incident at a residence in a Seattle suburb, police and court records say.
The inci… [+2309 chars]

articles.author: Jen Christensen, CNN
articles.title: Companies hope people will buy the idea of antibody treatments to prevent Covid
articles.description: Companies that make monoclonal antibody treatment for coronavirus infection hope Americas will buy into the idea that they're good prevention, too.
articles.content: (CNN)Makers of monoclonal antibody treatments say they have shown the therapies can help prevent severe coronavirus disease in people who are already infected. Now they're planning to ask the US Food… [+7006 chars]

articles.author: Christina Zdanowicz, CNN
articles.title: The son of polio vaccine creator Jonas Salk got the Covid-19 vaccine. He wants you to do it, too
articles.description: As Dr. Darrell Salk waited in line to receive his first dose of the Covid-19 vaccine, he realized he had been in a similar situation about 60 years ago.

articles.title: In pictures: Acclaimed actress Cloris Leachman
articles.description: Cloris Leachman, an award-winning actress whose career spanned seven decades, has died at the age of 94.
articles.content:
Cloris Leachman appears in the sitcom "Phyllis" in 1975.

Cloris Leachman appears in the sitcom "Phyllis" in 1975.

articles.author: Sandra Gonzalez, CNN
articles.title: Cloris Leachman, award-winning actress, dead at 94
articles.description: Cloris Leachman, the acclaimed actress whose one-of-a-kind comedic flare made her a legendary figure in film and television for seven decades, has died, according to a statement from her longtime manager and representatives. She was 94.
articles.content: (CNN)Cloris Leachman, the acclaimed actress whose one-of-a-kind comedic flair made her a legendary figure in film and television for seven decades, has died, according to a statement from her longtim… [+2759 chars]

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: After '7 minutes of terror,' NASA's Perseverance rover will begin an 'epic journey' on Mars next month
articles.description: In 22 days, NASA's Mars 2020 Perseverance rover will land on Mars in Jezero Crater to search for signs of ancient life that may have been on the red planet in the past.

articles.author: Sara Murray, CNN
articles.title: Biden administration takes cautious approach as it touts using Defense Production Act
articles.description: The Biden administration has repeatedly touted its plans to aggressively use the Defense Production Act as it combats the coronavirus pandemic, but behind the scenes, a slower, more painstaking effort is underway.
articles.content: (CNN)The Biden administration has repeatedly touted its plans to aggressively use the Defense Production Act as it combats the coronavirus pandemic, but behind the scenes, a slower, more painstaking … [+4193 chars]

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: The *next* 5 senators who might retire
articles.description: The surprise impending retirement of Ohio Sen. Rob Portman (R) announced earlier this week and the brief visit by Vermont Sen. Patrick Leahy (D) to the hospital on Tuesday night have political Washington on edge, waiting for the next stunner that could alter …

articles.author: Ryan Nobles, Terence Burlij and Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: Virginia gubernatorial candidate who called US Capitol rioters 'patriots' censured by state Senate
articles.description: The Virginia Senate voted Wednesday to censure state Sen. Amanda Chase, a Republican who is a candidate for governor, following her comments earlier this month referring to the rioters who stormed the US Capitol as "patriots."
